title: How to Make White Bean Puree

steps.headline: Place the beans, almonds, lemon juice and garlic in a food processor.
Remove the mixture from the processor container into a saucepan.
steps.description: Heat over low heat until the paste is warmed through.

steps.headline: Add salt and pepper to taste.
Remove from the heat and place in a serving dish.
steps.description: Top with a drizzle of olive oil and place on the table for serving. Cut up fresh crunchy bread (e.g, a baguette) or add lavash-style crackers. Provide a small spoon for serving from.

text: Place the beans, almonds, lemon juice and garlic in a food processor. Process until well blended. Gradually add the olive oil. Process through. Remove the mixture from the processor container into a saucepan. Heat over low heat until the paste is warmed through. Add salt and pepper to taste.  Remove from the heat and place in a serving dish. Top with a drizzle of olive oil and place on the table for serving. Cut up fresh crunchy bread (e.g, a baguette) or add lavash-style crackers. Provide a small spoon for serving from.
